title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pelješac Peninsula, Croatia
content:
Photo submitted by Mike Adamek, “I took the photo while on vacation in Croatia, on the Pelješac peninsula. The perfect place to forget yourself for a moment and ride gravel! @mikekemada” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pelješac Peninsula, Croatia appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
